N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 4215.4 - Establishment and administration of administrative expense trust accounts

State Regulations
(a) The corporation
shall establish an administrative expense trust fund account for each
administering corporation selected pursuant to section
4215.5
of this Part. (b) The initial deposit of trust fund
proceeds into an administrative expense trust fund account shall be in an
amount equal to $25,000. Such fund, and those funds deposited into said account
pursuant to subdivisions (c) and (d) of this section, respectively, may be used
by an administering corporation for the payment of administrative costs in the
manner and at such times as are set forth elsewhere in this section. (c) Interest accruing on trust fund proceeds
on deposit in a minority and women revolving loan trust fund account during an
administering corporation's first year of administering the financial
assistance programs set forth hereunder shall be deposited in the administering
corporation's administrative expense trust fund account for the payment of
administrative costs incurred by an administering corporation in administering
its corresponding minority and women revolving loan trust fund account
beginning in its second year of administering the financial assistance programs
set forth hereunder. (d) Repayment
of interest accrued on loans made with trust fund proceeds by an administering
corporation shall be deposited into its administrative expense trust fund
account for the payment of administrative costs incurred at any time. (e) The corporation shall make its first
disbursement of funds from an administrative expense trust fund account to the
administering corporation for which said account has been established when the
administering corporation has: (1)
submitted, in form and content satisfactory to the corporation, a budget for
administrative costs it anticipates incurring during the succeeding
quarter-annual period and a request for disbursement of administrative expense
trust fund account proceeds; and
(2)
satisfied such other conditions as may be
required by the agreement executed with the corporation pursuant to section
4215.5
(d) of this

Part. The amount of such disbursement shall be in the amount set forth in the
aforesaid quarter annual budget for administrative costs. The corporation shall
make additional disbursements of administrative expense trust fund account
proceeds at the beginning of each succeeding quarter-annual period pursuant to
succeeding quarter-annual budgets for administrative costs prepared by the
administering corporation for which the account has been established, provided
said budgets are approved, in advance, by the corporation. In no event shall
the corporation disburse to an administering corporation any funds for
administrative costs in excess of the balance on deposit in an administering
corporation's administrative expense trust fund account. Notes
